title: Alimens & Gentle Mens Solid Oxford Shirt Long Sleeve Dress Shirt Work Casual Button Down Shirts with Pocket
description: Material: This casual shirt made in high-quality cotton for a breathable and strong feeling, button down collar design, oxford fabric will gets softer with each wear
Design: Mens solid dress shirt, long sleeve, button-down front closure, back pleat, adjustable cuff for a tailored look and ensuring more flexibility when moving
Occasions: Casual Friday/Dating/Work/Office/Prom/Wedding/Concert/Perform/Party/Daily life, suitable for any casual occasions. It's also an ideal gift for husband, son, dad or friends
Match: Shirt for men can be worn with or without a tie, classic design chest pocket holds your essentials, match with casual pants, dress pants, or jeans
Care: Hand wash or machine wash cold; do not bleach, tumble dry low, low iron if necessary
